title: South Africa vs Namibia Rugby World Cup 2019 LIVE: Follow latest updates
text:
30 minutes

Adriaan Booysen is back with us after his ten-minute sit down, and immediately back in the thick of things, having to gather a bobbling ball as the Namibian scrum again bumbles under pressure from South Africa.

South Africa win a penalty from the next phase as they rip the ball from Namibia, and Elton Jantjies will again put them in the corner.

Or not! Jantjies skews it off the inside of his left boot and the ball hops back infield rather than out. Namibia will set a scrum (ahhhhhh!) inside the South African half.
description: Follow live updates from the Rugby World Cup as South Africa and Namibia head to head in Toyota. The Springboks will be looking to bounce back from their defeat against New Zealand, having lost 23-13 on the opening weekend of the tournament. They take on a Namibia side that will be licking the wounds of their 47-22 loss at the hands of Italy. Follow all the live action below:​
